summary: A command‑line utility that loads a SentencePiece model file and injects user‑specified special tokens into its vocabulary, rewriting the model so that downstream NLP components can rely on those tokens.
business_intent: Enable developers to customize tokenizers by adding required special symbols (e.g., padding, start‑of‑sentence, end‑of‑sentence) to a pre‑trained SentencePiece model, facilitating consistent preprocessing for language models and other text‑processing pipelines.
